<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zyss Serpentfolk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3181)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Even the least among zyss serpentfolk consider themselves greater than any mammal. Their magical abilities, most notably their telepathy, are all the reason they need to hold this view. And it's true enough that the instinctual skill and magic of any zyss is enough to best the average human.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Zyss_Serpentfolk.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Zyss Serpentfolk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3181)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=721" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
<trait label="Serpentfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=771" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 302 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sakvroth](/Languages.aspx?ID=118); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=79) 00 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +9, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +8, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -1

**Dex** +4

**Con** -2

**Int** +4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (30 arrows)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +8 (+4 status vs. [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647))

+1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644)
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 25

</row>

**Resistances**
[poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669) 5

**Thin of Blood** Zyss serpentfolk recover slowly from injuries. When they take physical damage from a critical hit, they gain 1d4 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). They take a –2 circumstance penalty to flat checks to recover from persistent damage and saving throws against afflictions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fangs +10 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus serpentfolk venom

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing plus serpentfolk venom

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shortbow +10 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing plus serpentfolk venom

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 18
- **1st**
[Illusory Disguise](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) (at will), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) (at will)
- **2nd**
[Blur](/Spells.aspx?ID=28) (self only; at will)
- **4th**
[Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315)

**Serpentfolk Venom**  ([Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 16 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=71) (1 round); **Stage 2** 2d4 poison damage and enfeebled 1 (1 round)

</column>
